address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Read, Douglas, Postcard, Crerar Ms 278, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: A postcard dated 6 April 1886. Addressed to Mr. Paul Lacombe, 3 Rue Laffitte, Paris. The postcard is written in French, and reads:
A call for you to respond that you have not yet come to see us at our place of study. 27 Rue des Pyramides, where we will show you everything you would like.
